name: restaurant-website
description: 1. Clone repository by running `git clone https://github.com/sandra-sanj/restaurant-website.git` in terminal. 2. Open cloned project folder in a code editor. 3. Run `npm install` to install everything in **package.json**. Run this command whenever said file is updated. 4. Copy the contents of **.env.sample** to new **.env** file in project root and modify all rows
